get.description: Get all Workbooks defined within a specified resource group and category.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Category of workbook to return.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Tags presents on each workbook returned.

parameters.name: sourceId
parameters.description: Azure Resource Id that will fetch all related workbooks.

parameters.name: canFetchContent
parameters.description: Flag indicating whether or not to return the full content for each applicable workbook. If false, only return summary content for workbooks.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

200.description: A list containing 0 or more workbook definitions.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get a single workbook by its resourceName.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.

parameters.name: sourceId
parameters.description: Azure Resource Id that will fetch all related workbooks.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

requestBody.description: Properties that need to be specified to create a new workbook.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

201.description: The workbook has been successfully deleted.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates a workbook that has already been added.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.

parameters.name: sourceId
parameters.description: Azure Resource Id that will fetch all related workbooks.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

requestBody.description: Properties that need to be specified to create a new workbook.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

kind.description: The kind of workbook. Choices are user and shared.

name.description: Azure resource name. This is GUID value. The display name should be assigned within properties field.

code.description: Service-defined error code. This code serves as a sub-status for the HTTP error code specified in the response.

details.description: The list of invalid fields send in request, in case of validation error.

WorkbookError.description: Error message body that will indicate why the operation failed.

category.description: Workbook category, as defined by the user at creation time.

displayName.description: The user-defined name (display name) of the workbook.

serializedData.description: Configuration of this particular workbook. Configuration data is a string containing valid JSON

tags.description: A list of 0 or more tags that are associated with this workbook definition

timeModified.description: Date and time in UTC of the last modification that was made to this workbook definition.

userId.description: Unique user id of the specific user that owns this workbook.

category.description: Workbook category, as defined by the user at creation time.

displayName.description: The user-defined name (display name) of the workbook.

serializedData.description: Configuration of this particular workbook. Configuration data is a string containing valid JSON

tags.description: A list of 0 or more tags that are associated with this workbook definition

WorkbookPropertiesUpdateParameters.description: Properties that contain a workbook for PATCH operation.

kind.description: The kind of workbook. Choices are user and shared.

WorkbookUpdateParameters.description: The parameters that can be provided when updating workbook properties properties.

CanFetchWorkbookContentParameter.name: canFetchContent
CanFetchWorkbookContentParameter.description: Flag indicating whether or not to return the full content for each applicable workbook. If false, only return summary content for workbooks.

SourceIdParameter.name: sourceId
SourceIdParameter.description: Azure Resource Id that will fetch all related workbooks.

TagsParameter.name: tags
TagsParameter.description: Tags presents on each workbook returned.

WorkbookResourceNameParameter.name: resourceName
WorkbookResourceNameParameter.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.
